title: Please Obey The Game - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Horror   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Manly Gay Couple   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   Unlimited Flow
author: 木兮娘
description:
As soon as Gao Yan came back from vacation in his hometown, he found that there was an eight-handed wooden evil Guanyin in his suitcase that could not be thrown away. 

The moment he stepped out of the temple, Gao Yan fell into the Guan Luo Yin scene. A prompting in his ears spoke: 

Welcome to the game of the gods~ 

First, please be sure to obey the words of the gods. 

Second, the latest red hot post on the top read: Shock! The whereabouts of Chu Suibi, the only person in the world who passed the main god-level difficulty, is unknown. According to insiders, Chu Suibi is chasing his wife.  Yes, you have read that right, that old dog forced Chu Suibi to have a wife! 

Gao Yan, who has never involved himself with worldly matters, meets Chu Suibi, someone who is too keen to break the rules.

Gao Yan: I am a good person. 

Chu Suibi: Me too. 

God: Bullshit!!!>
